paragraphs.0: Todd is building hyper-intelligent mentors and AI research platforms for sustainable agriculture. Not models trained solely on public information. Not simulated environments. Real, physical, proprietary data that characterizes soil, generates actionable practices, and gigabytes of data that exist nowhere else.
paragraphs.1: Our approach starts with a multi-strategy, generative agriculture thesis where mineral levels are closely monitored to help predict future outcomes and build superior long-term farm value. We deploy location-specific resources to farms everywhere, from renowned coastal areas to mountainous hollows— driving measurable impact and propelling a virtuous cycle of improved soil quality and healthier produce.

culture.description: We’ve built a distinctive culture that shapes everything we do—whether we’re working, socializing or supporting our communities. Our leadership shares a determination and responsibility for growing and developing our next generation of leaders.

competencies.title: Todd is differentiated by a combination of three core competencies.

items.1: Understanding of Modern Consumer Demands and Channels
items.2: Positioned at the Frontier of Sustainable Agriculture

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: We’re fortunate to be supported by investors and industry partners who share our vision. Their backing will help us grow our team, scale our firm, and develop the first generation of generative farms.
